alert.note: Alert for Orange; Putnam (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 1:49PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Orange and western Putnam Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 148 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gardnertown, or near Newburgh, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newburgh, Walden, Cold Spring, New Windsor, Gardnertown, Fahnestock State Park, Orange Lake, Firthcliffe, Vails Gate, Balmville, Cornwall On Hudson and Maybrook. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
